name: classes-have-instances
label: All classes should have instances
description: Select this test if your ontology does not accept non-instantiated classes, i.e., classes that works as roles

name: top-level-classes
label: Fixed top-level classes
description: Select this test if users are prohibited to change the first level of the classes hierarchy. In this case, provide the list of the names of first-level classes (comma-separated).
